titles.title: Kulpsville Transportation Center Development Act of 1994
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project for the implementation of a comprehensive transportation improvement program in Kulpsville, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

term.name: Federal aid to air pollution control

bill.summary: 10/6/1994--Introduced. Kulpsville Transportation Center Development Act of 1994 - Requires the Secretary of Transportation to provide for a demonstration project to implement a comprehensive transportation improvement program in the township of Towamencin, village of Kulpsville, Pennsylvania. Authorizes appropriations.
